trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to add more headers after the headers had already been sent.
trans-unit.target: 有人试图在已经发送了头条后再添加更多的头条。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to allocate memory (usually in the C++ layer) but it failed.
trans-unit.target: 试图分配内存(通常在C++层),但失败了。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to bind a socket that has already been bound.
trans-unit.target: 有人试图绑定一个已经被绑定的插座。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to call stream.pipe() on a Writable stream.
trans-unit.target: 试图在 Writable 流上调用 stream.pipe() 。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to call stream.push() after a null(EOF) had been pushed to the stream.
trans-unit.target: 在将 null （EOF）推送到流之后，尝试调用 stream.push() 。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to call stream.unshift() after the 'end' event was emitted.
trans-unit.target: 尝试在发出 'end' 事件后调用 stream.unshift() 。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to call stream.write() after stream.end() has been called.
trans-unit.target: 试图调用由 stream.write() 后 stream.end() 被调用。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to call stream.write() with a null chunk.
trans-unit.target: 尝试使用 null 块调用 stream.write() 。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to close the process.stderr stream. By design, Node.js does not allow stdout or stderr streams to be closed by user code.
trans-unit.target: 试图关闭 process.stderr 流。根据设计，Node.js不允许用户代码关闭 stdout 或 stderr 流。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to close the process.stdout stream. By design, Node.js does not allow stdout or stderr streams to be closed by user code.
trans-unit.target: 试图关闭 process.stdout 流。根据设计，Node.js不允许用户代码关闭 stdout 或 stderr 流。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to connect a Http2Session object to a net.Socket or tls.TLSSocket that had already been bound to another Http2Session object.
trans-unit.target: 试图将 Http2Session 对象连接到已经绑定到另一个 Http2Session 对象的 net.Socket 或 tls.TLSSocket 。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to create a Node.js Buffer instance from addon or embedder code, while in a JS engine Context that is not associated with a Node.js instance. The data passed to the Buffer method will have been released by the time the method returns.
trans-unit.target: 试图在插件引擎或与Node.js实例无关的Context中，通过插件或嵌入代码创建Node.js Buffer 实例。传递给 Buffer 方法的数据将在该方法返回时释放。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to create a child Node.js process using more than one IPC communication channel. See the documentation for the child_process module for more information.
trans-unit.target: 尝试使用多个IPC通信通道来创建子Node.js进程。有关更多信息，请参见 child_process 模块的文档。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to create a push stream, which had been disabled by the client.
trans-unit.target: 试图创建一个推送流,但被客户端禁用。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to directly manipulate (read, write, pause, resume, etc.) a socket attached to an Http2Session.
trans-unit.target: 试图直接操纵（读取，写入，暂停，恢复等）连接到 Http2Session 的套接字。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to disconnect an IPC communication channel that was already disconnected. See the documentation for the child_process module for more information.
trans-unit.target: 试图断开已经断开的IPC通信通道。有关更多信息，请参见 child_process 模块的文档。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to enable or disable FIPS mode, but FIPS mode was not available.
trans-unit.target: 试图启用或禁用FIPS模式,但FIPS模式不可用。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to initiate a new push stream from within a push stream. Nested push streams are not permitted.
trans-unit.target: 试图从推流中发起一个新的推流。不允许使用嵌套推流。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to initiate operations on a watcher returned by fs.watch() that has not yet been started.
trans-unit.target: 试图在尚未启动的由 fs.watch() 返回的监视程序上启动操作。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to issue Server Name Indication from a TLS server-side socket, which is only valid from a client.
trans-unit.target: 试图从TLS服务器端套接字发出服务器名称指示,而这只在客户端有效。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to launch a Node.js process with an unknown stdin file type. This error is usually an indication of a bug within Node.js itself, although it is possible for user code to trigger it.
trans-unit.target: 尝试使用未知的 stdin 文件类型启动Node.js进程。该错误通常表示Node.js本身存在错误，尽管用户代码有可能触发该错误。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to launch a Node.js process with an unknown stdout or stderr file type. This error is usually an indication of a bug within Node.js itself, although it is possible for user code to trigger it.
trans-unit.target: 试图启动具有未知 stdout 或 stderr 文件类型的Node.js进程。该错误通常表示Node.js本身存在错误，尽管用户代码有可能触发该错误。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to load a module with an unknown or unsupported file extension.
trans-unit.target: 试图加载一个文件扩展名未知或不支持的模块。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to load a module with an unknown or unsupported format.
trans-unit.target: 试图加载一个格式不明或不支持的模块。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to load a policy manifest, but the manifest had multiple entries for a resource which did not match each other. Update the manifest entries to match in order to resolve this error. See the documentation for policy manifests for more information.
trans-unit.target: 试图加载策略清单，但清单中有多个资源条目彼此不匹配。更新清单条目以匹配以解决此错误。有关更多信息，请参阅策略清单的文档。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to load a policy manifest, but the manifest was unable to be parsed. See the documentation for policy manifests for more information.
trans-unit.target: 试图加载策略清单，但清单无法解析。有关更多信息，请参阅策略清单的文档。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to load a resource, but the resource did not match the integrity defined by the policy manifest. See the documentation for policy manifests for more information.
trans-unit.target: 尝试加载资源，但是资源与策略清单定义的完整性不匹配。有关更多信息，请参阅策略清单的文档。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to load a resource, but the resource was not listed as a dependency from the location that attempted to load it. See the documentation for policy manifests for more information.
trans-unit.target: 尝试加载资源，但是未将资源列为尝试加载资源的依赖项。有关更多信息，请参阅策略清单的文档。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to open an IPC communication channel with a synchronously forked Node.js process. See the documentation for the child_process module for more information.
trans-unit.target: 试图通过同步分支的Node.js进程打开IPC通信通道。有关更多信息，请参见 child_process 模块的文档。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to operate on an already closed socket.
trans-unit.target: 有人试图在一个已经关闭的插座上进行操作。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to read an encrypted key without specifying a passphrase.
trans-unit.target: 试图在没有指定密码的情况下读取加密的密钥。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to read from a policy manifest, but the manifest initialization has not yet taken place. This is likely a bug in Node.js.
trans-unit.target: 试图从策略清单中读取,但还没有进行清单初始化。这可能是Node.js中的一个错误。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to register something that is not a function as an AsyncHooks callback.
trans-unit.target: 试图将不是函数的内容注册为 AsyncHooks 回调。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to renegotiate TLS on a socket instance with TLS disabled.
trans-unit.target: 试图在禁用TLS的套接字实例上重新协商TLS。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to send an unsupported "handle" over an IPC communication channel to a child process. See subprocess.send() and process.send() for more information.
trans-unit.target: 试图通过IPC通信通道将不支持的“句柄”发送给子进程。有关更多信息，请参见 subprocess.send() 和 process.send() 。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to send multiple response headers.
trans-unit.target: 试图发送多个响应头。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to start a watcher returned by fs.watch() that has already been started.
trans-unit.target: 试图启动已经启动的 fs.watch() 返回的监视程序。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to use a URL of an incompatible scheme (protocol) for a specific purpose. It is only used in the WHATWG URL API support in the fs module (which only accepts URLs with 'file' scheme), but may be used in other Node.js APIs as well in the future.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将不兼容方案（协议）的URL用于特定目的。它仅在 fs 模块的WHATWG URL API支持中使用（仅接受带有 'file' 方案的URL ），但将来也可能在其他Node.js API中使用。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to use an IPC communication channel that was already closed.
trans-unit.target: 有人试图使用已经关闭的IPC通信渠道。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to use crypto features while Node.js was not compiled with OpenSSL crypto support.
trans-unit.target: 在Node.js没有编译支持OpenSSL加密功能的情况下,尝试使用加密功能。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to use features that require ICU, but Node.js was not compiled with ICU support.
trans-unit.target: 尝试使用需要ICU的功能，但是Node.js并未使用ICU支持进行编译。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to use the Http2Stream.prototype.responseWithFile() API to send a directory.
trans-unit.target: 试图使用 Http2Stream.prototype.responseWithFile() API发送目录。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to use the Http2Stream.prototype.responseWithFile() API to send something other than a regular file, but offset or length options were provided.
trans-unit.target: 尝试使用 Http2Stream.prototype.responseWithFile() API发送常规文件以外的其他内容，但提供了 offset 或 length 选项。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to use the socket property of an Http2Session that has already been closed.
trans-unit.target: 试图使用已关闭的 Http2Session 的 socket 属性。

trans-unit.source: An easier method of constructing the mode is to use a sequence of three octal digits (e.g. 765). The left-most digit (7 in the example), specifies the permissions for the file owner. The middle digit (6 in the example), specifies permissions for the group. The right-most digit (5 in the example), specifies the permissions for others.
trans-unit.target: 构造 mode 一种更简单的方法是使用三个八进制数字的序列（例如 765 ）。最左边的数字（在示例中为 7 ）指定文件所有者的权限。中间数字（在示例中为 6 ）指定该组的权限。最右边的数字（在示例中为 5 ）指定其他用户的权限。

trans-unit.source: An element in the iterable provided to the WHATWGURLSearchParams constructor did not represent a [name, value] tuple – that is, if an element is not iterable, or does not consist of exactly two elements.
trans-unit.target: 提供给WHATWG URLSearchParams 构造函数的 iterable 中的元素不表示 [name, value] 元组-也就是说，如果元素不可迭代，或者不完全由两个元素组成。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while attempting to retrieve the JavaScript undefined value.
trans-unit.target: 尝试检索JavaScript undefined 值时发生错误。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while invoking the JavaScript portion of the thread-safe function.
trans-unit.target: 在调用线程安全函数的JavaScript部分时发生错误。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while issuing a command via the inspector module.
trans-unit.target: 通过 inspector 模块发出命令时发生错误。

trans-unit.source: An error returned by stream.finished() and stream.pipeline(), when a stream or a pipeline ends non gracefully with no explicit error.
trans-unit.target: 当流或管道非正常结束且没有显式错误时， stream.finished() 和 stream.pipeline() 返回的错误。

trans-unit.source: An error will be thrown if an invalid address is provided.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了一个无效的地址,将抛出一个错误。

trans-unit.target: 一个可能的输出的例子是这样的。

trans-unit.source: An exception is thrown when any of the input arguments specify invalid values or types.
trans-unit.target: 当任何一个输入参数指定了无效的值或类型时,就会抛出一个异常。

trans-unit.source: An exception is thrown when key derivation fails, otherwise the derived key is returned as a Buffer.
trans-unit.target: 密钥派生失败时将引发异常，否则派生的密钥将作为 Buffer 返回。

trans-unit.source: An exception will be thrown if there is no active inspector.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有活动的检查员,就会产生异常。

trans-unit.source: An excessive amount of TLS renegotiations is detected, which is a potential vector for denial-of-service attacks.
trans-unit.target: 检测到过量的TLS重新协商,这是拒绝服务攻击的潜在载体。

trans-unit.source: An immutable array of strings representing the root certificates (in PEM format) used for verifying peer certificates. This is the default value of the ca option to tls.createSecureContext().
trans-unit.target: 字符串的不可变数组，表示用于验证对等证书的根证书（PEM格式）。这是 tls.createSecureContext() 的 ca 选项的默认值。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the WHATWG Encoding StandardTextDecoder API.
trans-unit.target: 的的实现WHATWG编码标准 TextDecoder API。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the WHATWG Encoding StandardTextEncoder API. All instances of TextEncoder only support UTF-8 encoding.
trans-unit.target: 的的实现WHATWG编码标准 TextEncoder API。 TextEncoder 的所有实例仅支持UTF-8编码。

trans-unit.source: An important drawback when calling process.dlopen() is that the module instance must be passed. Functions exported by the C++ Addon will be accessible via module.exports.
trans-unit.target: 调用 process.dlopen() 时的一个重要缺点是必须传递 module 实例。由C ++插件导出的函数可以通过 module.exports 访问。

trans-unit.source: An improved alternative API is available.
trans-unit.target: 一个改进的替代API已经可用。

trans-unit.source: An independent resolver for DNS requests.
trans-unit.target: 一个独立的DNS请求解析器。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the PerformanceNodeTiming class that provides performance metrics for specific Node.js operational milestones.
trans-unit.target: PerformanceNodeTiming 类的实例，为特定的Node.js操作里程碑提供性能指标。

trans-unit.source: An integer identifier for the current thread. On the corresponding worker object (if there is any), it is available as worker.threadId. This value is unique for each Worker instance inside a single process.
trans-unit.target: 当前线程的整数标识符。在相应的工作程序对象（如果有）上，它可以作为 worker.threadId 使用。该值对于单个进程内的每个 Worker 实例都是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: An integer identifier for the referenced thread. Inside the worker thread, it is available as require('worker_threads').threadId. This value is unique for each Worker instance inside a single process.
trans-unit.target: 所引用线程的整数标识符。在工作线程内，它可以作为 require('worker_threads').threadId 。该值对于单个进程内的每个 Worker 实例都是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: An internal method used to parse and execute REPLServer keywords. Returns true if keyword is a valid keyword, otherwise false.
trans-unit.target: 一种内部方法，用于解析和执行 REPLServer 关键字。如果 keyword 是有效的关键字，则返回 true ，否则返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: An invalid (negative) size was passed for either the recvBufferSize or sendBufferSize options in dgram.createSocket().
trans-unit.target: 为 dgram.createSocket() 中的 recvBufferSize 或 sendBufferSize 选项传递了无效（负）大小。

trans-unit.source: An invalid crypto digest algorithm was specified.
trans-unit.target: 指定了无效的加密摘要算法。

trans-unit.source: An invalid asyncId or triggerAsyncId was passed using AsyncHooks. An id less than -1 should never happen.
trans-unit.target: 无效的 asyncId 或 triggerAsyncId 使用通过 AsyncHooks 。小于-1的id永远不会发生。

trans-unit.source: An invalid options.protocol was passed to http.request().
trans-unit.target: 无效的 options.protocol 传递给了 http.request() 。

trans-unit.source: An invalid package.json file was found which failed parsing.
trans-unit.target: 发现无效的 package.json 文件，解析失败。

trans-unit.source: An invalid HTTP header value was specified.
trans-unit.target: 指定了一个无效的HTTP头值。

trans-unit.source: An invalid HTTP informational status code has been specified. Informational status codes must be an integer between 100 and 199 (inclusive).
trans-unit.target: 指定了无效的HTTP信息状态代码。信息状态代码必须是 100 到 199 （含）之间的整数。

trans-unit.source: An invalid HTTP status code has been specified. Status codes must be an integer between 100 and 599 (inclusive).
trans-unit.target: 指定了无效的HTTP状态代码。状态码必须是 100 到 599 （含）之间的整数。

trans-unit.source: An invalid HTTP token was supplied.
trans-unit.target: 提供了一个无效的HTTP令牌。

trans-unit.source: An invalid HTTP/2 header value was specified.
trans-unit.target: 指定了一个无效的HTTP/2头值。

trans-unit.source: An invalid URI was passed.
trans-unit.target: 通过了一个无效的URI。

trans-unit.source: An invalid URL was passed to the WHATWGURL constructor to be parsed. The thrown error object typically has an additional property 'input' that contains the URL that failed to parse.
trans-unit.target: 无效的URL传递给WHATWG URL 构造函数进行解析。引发的错误对象通常具有附加属性 'input' ，其中包含无法解析的URL。

trans-unit.source: An invalid crypto engine identifier was passed to require('crypto').setEngine().
trans-unit.target: 无效的加密引擎标识符已传递给 require('crypto').setEngine() 。

trans-unit.source: An invalid or unexpected value was passed in an options object.
trans-unit.target: 在选项对象中传递了一个无效或意外的值。

trans-unit.source: An invalid or unknown encoding option was passed to an API.
trans-unit.target: 向API传递了一个无效或未知的编码选项。

trans-unit.source: An invalid or unknown file encoding was passed.
trans-unit.target: 通过了一个无效或未知的文件编码。

trans-unit.source: An invalid or unknown process signal was passed to an API expecting a valid signal (such as subprocess.kill()).
trans-unit.target: 无效或未知的过程信号已传递给期望有效信号的API（例如 subprocess.kill() ）。

trans-unit.source: An invalid or unsupported value was passed for a given argument.
trans-unit.target: 为给定的参数传递了一个无效或不支持的值。

trans-unit.source: An invalid parameter key was passed during construction of a Brotli stream.
trans-unit.target: 在构建Brotli流的过程中,传递了一个无效的参数键。

trans-unit.source: An invalid symlink type was passed to the fs.symlink() or fs.symlinkSync() methods.
trans-unit.target: 无效的符号链接类型已传递给 fs.symlink() 或 fs.symlinkSync() 方法。

trans-unit.source: An invalid transfer object was passed to postMessage().
trans-unit.target: 无效的传输对象已传递给 postMessage() 。

trans-unit.source: An invalid value for the format argument was passed to the crypto.ECDH() class getPublicKey() method.
trans-unit.target: format 参数的无效值已传递给 crypto.ECDH() 类 getPublicKey() 方法。

trans-unit.source: An invalid value for the key argument has been passed to the crypto.ECDH() class computeSecret() method. It means that the public key lies outside of the elliptic curve.
trans-unit.target: key 参数的无效值已传递到 crypto.ECDH() 类的 computeSecret() 方法。这意味着公钥位于椭圆曲线之外。

trans-unit.source: An invalid value has been specified for an HTTP/2 setting.
trans-unit.target: 为HTTP/2设置指定了一个无效的值。

trans-unit.source: An iterable argument (i.e. a value that works with for...of loops) was required, but not provided to a Node.js API.
trans-unit.target: 需要一个可迭代的参数（即，适用于 for...of 循环的值），但未提供给Node.js API。

trans-unit.source: An npm module like asn1.js may be used to parse the certificates.
trans-unit.target: 像asn1.js这样的npm模块可以用来解析证书。

trans-unit.source: An object containing the outbound headers sent for this Http2Stream.
trans-unit.target: 包含为此 Http2Stream 发送的出站头的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object containing the outbound trailers sent for this HttpStream.
trans-unit.target: 包含为此 HttpStream 发送的出站拖车的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object describing the current status of this Http2Session.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，描述此 Http2Session 的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: An object which contains arrays of sockets currently awaiting use by the agent when keepAlive is enabled. Do not modify.
trans-unit.target: 启用 keepAlive 时，此对象包含当前正在等待代理使用的套接字数组。请勿修改。

trans-unit.source: An object which contains arrays of sockets currently in use by the agent. Do not modify.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含代理当前使用的socket数组的对象。不要修改。

trans-unit.source: An object which contains queues of requests that have not yet been assigned to sockets. Do not modify.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含尚未分配给套接字的请求队列的对象。请勿修改。

trans-unit.source: An operation outside the bounds of a Buffer was attempted.
trans-unit.target: 尝试了在 Buffer 范围之外的操作。

trans-unit.source: An operation was performed on a stream that had already been destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 对已经被破坏的溪流进行了手术。

trans-unit.source: An option pair is incompatible with each other and can not be used at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 一个选项对之间是不兼容的,不能同时使用。

trans-unit.source: An optional callback function may be specified to as a way of reporting DNS errors or for determining when it is safe to reuse the buf object. DNS lookups delay the time to send for at least one tick of the Node.js event loop.
trans-unit.target: 可以指定一个可选的 callback 函数，以作为报告DNS错误或确定何时可以安全地重用 buf 对象的方式。DNS查找延迟了至少一滴Node.js事件循环的发送时间。

trans-unit.source: An overview of available Node.js and JavaScript features for each configure option:
trans-unit.target: 每个 configure 选项的可用Node.js和JavaScript功能概述：

trans-unit.source: An unhandled error occurred (for instance, when an 'error' event is emitted by an EventEmitter but an 'error' handler is not registered).
trans-unit.target: 发生未处理的错误（例如，当一个 'error' 事件是由发射 EventEmitter 而是一个 'error' 处理未注册）。

trans-unit.source: An unspecified or non-specific system error has occurred within the Node.js process. The error object will have an err.info object property with additional details.
trans-unit.target: Node.js进程中发生了未指定或非特定的系统错误。错误对象将具有 err.info 对象属性，其中包含其他详细信息。

trans-unit.source: An upgrade of zlib from 1.2.8 to 1.2.11 changed behavior when windowBits is set to 8 for raw deflate streams. zlib would automatically set windowBits to 9 if was initially set to 8. Newer versions of zlib will throw an exception, so Node.js restored the original behavior of upgrading a value of 8 to 9, since passing windowBits = 9 to zlib actually results in a compressed stream that effectively uses an 8-bit window only.
trans-unit.target: 当将原始放气流的 windowBits 设置为8 时，zlib从1.2.8升级到1.2.11更改了行为。如果最初设置为8，则zlib会自动将 windowBits 设置为9。较新版本的zlib将引发异常，因此Node.js恢复了将值8升级为9的原始行为，因为将 windowBits = 9 传递给zlib实际上会导致有效使用8位窗口的压缩流。

trans-unit.source: Another option is to use the macro NODE_MODULE_INIT(), which will also construct a context-aware addon. Unlike NODE_MODULE(), which is used to construct an addon around a given addon initializer function, NODE_MODULE_INIT() serves as the declaration of such an initializer to be followed by a function body.
trans-unit.target: 另一个选择是使用宏 NODE_MODULE_INIT() ，它还将构造一个上下文感知的插件。与 NODE_MODULE() 用于围绕给定的插件初始化器函数构造插件的方法不同， NODE_MODULE_INIT() 用作此类初始化器的声明，后跟函数体。

trans-unit.source: Another subtlety with promises is that before and after callbacks are run only on chained promises. That means promises not created by then()/catch() will not have the before and after callbacks fired on them. For more details see the details of the V8 PromiseHooks API.
trans-unit.target: 关于诺言的另一个微妙之处在于，回调仅在链接的诺言上运行 before 和 after 。这意味着不是由 then() / catch() 创建的promise 将不会在它们 before 和 after 触发回调。有关更多详细信息，请参见V8 PromiseHooks API 的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Another way of stating this is that, unlike in synchronous code where there is an ever-growing list of unhandled exceptions, with Promises there can be a growing-and-shrinking list of unhandled rejections.
trans-unit.target: 另一种说法是,不像在同步代码中,有一个不断增长的未处理异常列表,而在承诺中,可以有一个不断增长和缩小的未处理拒绝列表。

trans-unit.source: Any Promises created in VM contexts no longer have a .domain property. Their handlers are still executed in the proper domain, however, and Promises created in the main context still possess a .domain property.
trans-unit.target: 在VM上下文中创建的所有 Promise 都不再具有 .domain 属性。它们的处理程序仍在适当的域中执行，但是在主上下文中创建的 Promise 仍然具有 .domain 属性。

trans-unit.source: Any non-NULL data which is passed to this API via the data field of the napi_property_descriptor items can be associated with object and freed whenever object is garbage-collected by passing both object and the data to napi_add_finalizer.
trans-unit.target: 通过 napi_property_descriptor 项的 data 字段传递给此API的任何非 NULL 数据都可以与 object 关联，并在将 object 和数据都传递给 napi_add_finalizer 的情况下对 object 进行垃圾回收时将其释放。

trans-unit.source: Any non-NULL data which is passed to this API via the data parameter can be associated with the resulting JavaScript function (which is returned in the result parameter) and freed whenever the function is garbage-collected by passing both the JavaScript function and the data to napi_add_finalizer.
trans-unit.target: 通过 data 参数传递给此API的任何非 NULL 数据都可以与结果JavaScript函数关联（在 result 参数中返回），并且只要通过传递JavaScript函数和数据进行垃圾回收，就可以释放该数据到 napi_add_finalizer 。

trans-unit.source: Any non-NULL data which is passed to this API via the data parameter or via the data field of the napi_property_descriptor array items can be associated with the resulting JavaScript constructor (which is returned in the result parameter) and freed whenever the class is garbage-collected by passing both the JavaScript function and the data to napi_add_finalizer.
trans-unit.target: 通过 data 参数或通过 napi_property_descriptor 数组项的 data 字段传递给此API的任何非 NULL 数据，都可以与结果JavaScript构造函数相关联（在 result 参数中返回），并且只要该类为垃圾对象就将其释放-通过将JavaScript函数和数据传递到 napi_add_finalizer 来收集。

trans-unit.source: Associates the dgram.Socket to a remote address and port. Every message sent by this handle is automatically sent to that destination. Also, the socket will only receive messages from that remote peer. Trying to call connect() on an already connected socket will result in an ERR_SOCKET_DGRAM_IS_CONNECTED exception. If address is not provided, '127.0.0.1' (for udp4 sockets) or '::1' (for udp6 sockets) will be used by default. Once the connection is complete, a 'connect' event is emitted and the optional callback function is called. In case of failure, the callback is called or, failing this, an 'error' event is emitted.
trans-unit.target: 将 dgram.Socket 关联到远程地址和端口。该句柄发送的每条消息都会自动发送到该目的地。另外，套接字将仅从该远程对等方接收消息。尝试在已连接的套接字上调用 connect() 将导致 ERR_SOCKET_DGRAM_IS_CONNECTED 异常。如果未提供 address 则默认使用 '127.0.0.1' （用于 udp4 套接字）或 '::1' （用于 udp6 套接字）。连接完成后， 'connect' 发出“ connect”事件并 callback 可选的回调函数。如果失败，则 callback 被调用，否则，将发出 'error' 事件。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous symlink(2). No arguments other than a possible exception are given to the completion callback. The type argument is only available on Windows and ignored on other platforms. It can be set to 'dir', 'file', or 'junction'. If the type argument is not set, Node will autodetect target type and use 'file' or 'dir'. If the target does not exist, 'file' will be used. Windows junction points require the destination path to be absolute. When using 'junction', the target argument will automatically be normalized to absolute path.
trans-unit.target: 异步 symlink(2) 。除了可能的异常外，没有其他参数被赋予完成回调。该 type 参数是仅适用于Windows和忽视其他平台上。可以将其设置为 'dir' ， 'file' 或 'junction' 。如果未设置 type 参数，则Node将自动检测 target 类型并使用 'file' 或 'dir' 。如果 target 不存在，将使用 'file' 。 Windows连接点要求目标路径是绝对路径。当使用 'junction' 时， target 参数将自动归一化为绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: Because Duplex and Transform streams are both Readable and Writable, each maintains two separate internal buffers used for reading and writing, allowing each side to operate independently of the other while maintaining an appropriate and efficient flow of data. For example, net.Socket instances are Duplex streams whose Readable side allows consumption of data received from the socket and whose Writable side allows writing data to the socket. Because data may be written to the socket at a faster or slower rate than data is received, it is important for each side to operate (and buffer) independently of the other.
trans-unit.target: 由于 Duplex 和 Transform 流都是 Readable 和 Writable ，因此每个流维护两个用于读取和写入的独立内部缓冲区，从而允许每一侧在保持适当和有效的数据流的同时彼此独立地进行操作。例如， net.Socket 实例是 Duplex 流，其 Readable 侧允许接收数据的消费从插座，其 Writable 侧允许将数据写入到插座。由于以比接收数据更快或更慢的速率将数据写入套接字，因此使每一侧独立于另一侧进行操作（和缓冲）非常重要。

trans-unit.source: Because PerformanceObserver instances introduce their own additional performance overhead, instances should not be left subscribed to notifications indefinitely. Users should disconnect observers as soon as they are no longer needed.
trans-unit.target: 由于 PerformanceObserver 实例会引入自己的额外性能开销，因此不应将实例无限期地订阅通知。用户应在不再需要观察者时断开它们的连接。

trans-unit.source: Because kill() attempts to gracefully disconnect the worker process, it is susceptible to waiting indefinitely for the disconnect to complete. For example, if the worker enters an infinite loop, a graceful disconnect will never occur. If the graceful disconnect behavior is not needed, use worker.process.kill().
trans-unit.target: 由于 kill() 试图正常断开工作进程的连接，因此很容易无限期地等待断开连接的完成。例如，如果工作人员进入无限循环，则永远不会发生正常断开。如果不需要正常的断开行为，请使用 worker.process.kill() 。

trans-unit.source: Because module provides a filename property (normally equivalent to __filename), the entry point of the current application can be obtained by checking require.main.filename.
trans-unit.target: 由于 module 提供了 filename 属性（通常等效于 __filename ），因此可以通过检查 require.main.filename 来获取当前应用程序的入口点。

trans-unit.source: Because nice values are Unix-specific, on Windows the nice values of all processors are always 0.
trans-unit.target: 因为 nice 值是特定于Unix的，所以在Windows上，所有处理器的 nice 值始终为0。

trans-unit.source: Because server.listen() hands off most of the work to the master process, there are three cases where the behavior between a normal Node.js process and a cluster worker differs:
trans-unit.target: 因为 server.listen() 将大部分工作交给了主进程，所以在三种情况下，正常的Node.js进程和集群工作器之间的行为是不同的：

trans-unit.source: Because vm.runInThisContext() does not have access to the local scope, localVar is unchanged. In contrast, eval()does have access to the local scope, so the value localVar is changed. In this way vm.runInThisContext() is much like an indirect eval() call, e.g. (0,eval)('code').
trans-unit.target: 由于 vm.runInThisContext() 不能访问本地作用域， localVar 的是不变的。相反， eval() 确实可以访问本地范围，因此更改了 localVar 值。这样， vm.runInThisContext() 非常类似于间接 eval() 调用，例如 (0,eval)('code') 。

trans-unit.source: Because JavaScript does not have support for multiple inheritance, the stream.Duplex class is extended to implement a Duplex stream (as opposed to extending the stream.Readableandstream.Writable classes).
trans-unit.target: 因为JavaScript不支持多重继承，所以 stream.Duplex 类被扩展为实现 Duplex 流（与扩展 stream.Readable 和 stream.Writable 类相反）。

trans-unit.source: Because RSA public keys can be derived from private keys, a private key may be passed instead of a public key.
trans-unit.target: 因为RSA公钥可以从私钥中推导出来,所以可以通过私钥来代替公钥。

trans-unit.source: Because libuv's threadpool has a fixed size, it means that if for whatever reason any of these APIs takes a long time, other (seemingly unrelated) APIs that run in libuv's threadpool will experience degraded performance. In order to mitigate this issue, one potential solution is to increase the size of libuv's threadpool by setting the 'UV_THREADPOOL_SIZE' environment variable to a value greater than 4 (its current default value). For more information, see the libuv threadpool documentation.
trans-unit.target: 因为libuv的线程池的大小是固定的，所以这意味着，如果出于某种原因，这些API中的任何一个都花费很长时间，那么在libuv的线程池中运行的其他（看似无关）的API的性能将会降低。为了缓解此问题，一种可能的解决方案是通过将环境变量 'UV_THREADPOOL_SIZE' 设置为大于 4 的值（其当前默认值）来增加libuv的线程池的大小。有关更多信息，请参见libuv线程池文档。

trans-unit.source: Because listeners are managed using an internal array, calling this will change the position indices of any listener registered after the listener being removed. This will not impact the order in which listeners are called, but it means that any copies of the listener array as returned by the emitter.listeners() method will need to be recreated.
trans-unit.target: 由于使用内部数组管理侦听器，因此调用此方法将更改删除侦听器后注册的所有侦听器的位置索引。这不会影响侦听器的调用顺序，但是这意味着需要重新创建 emitter.listeners() 方法返回的侦听器数组的任何副本。

trans-unit.source: Because long living server connections may block workers from disconnecting, it may be useful to send a message, so application specific actions may be taken to close them. It also may be useful to implement a timeout, killing a worker if the 'disconnect' event has not been emitted after some time.
trans-unit.target: 由于长时间的服务器连接可能会阻止工作人员断开连接，因此发送消息可能很有用，因此可以采取特定于应用程序的操作来关闭它们。如果在一段时间后仍未发出 'disconnect' 事件，则实施超时可能会有用，它会杀死一个工作线程。

trans-unit.source: Because of the internal mechanics of how the process.nextTick() queue and the microtask queue that underlies Promises are implemented within V8 and Node.js, it is possible for code running within a context to "escape" the timeout set using vm.runInContext(), vm.runInNewContext(), and vm.runInThisContext().
trans-unit.target: 由于在V8和Node.js中实现了Promise基础的 process.nextTick() 队列和微任务队列的内部机制，因此在上下文中运行的代码可以使用 vm.runInContext() “转义” timeout 设置。（）， vm.runInNewContext() 和 vm.runInThisContext() 。

trans-unit.source: Because of the need for standard compliance, this method does not allow users to customize the serialization process of the URL. For more flexibility, require('url').format() method might be of interest.
trans-unit.target: 由于需要符合标准，因此此方法不允许用户自定义URL的序列化过程。为了获得更大的灵活性，可能 require('url').format() 方法。

trans-unit.source: Because of the specific serialization and processing requirements imposed by the HTTP/2 protocol, it is not recommended for user code to read data from or write data to a Socket instance bound to a Http2Session. Doing so can put the HTTP/2 session into an indeterminate state causing the session and the socket to become unusable.
trans-unit.target: 由于HTTP / 2协议强加了特定的序列化和处理要求，因此不建议用户代码从绑定到 Http2Session 的 Socket 实例读取数据或向其写入数据。这样做会使HTTP / 2会话进入不确定状态，从而导致会话和套接字变得不可用。

trans-unit.source: Because printing to the console is an asynchronous operation, console.log() will cause the AsyncHooks callbacks to be called. Using console.log() or similar asynchronous operations inside an AsyncHooks callback function will thus cause an infinite recursion. An easy solution to this when debugging is to use a synchronous logging operation such as fs.writeFileSync(file, msg, flag). This will print to the file and will not invoke AsyncHooks recursively because it is synchronous.
trans-unit.target: 因为打印到控制台是异步操作，所以 console.log() 将导致调用AsyncHooks回调。因此，在AsyncHooks回调函数中使用 console.log() 或类似的异步操作将导致无限递归。调试时对此的一个简单解决方案是使用同步日志记录操作，例如 fs.writeFileSync(file, msg, flag) 。这将打印到文件，并且不会递归调用AsyncHooks，因为它是同步的。

trans-unit.source: Because public keys can be derived from private keys, a private key may be passed instead of a public key.
trans-unit.target: 因为公钥可以从私钥衍生出来,所以可以通过私钥代替公钥。

trans-unit.source: Because public keys can be derived from private keys, a private key may be passed instead of a public key. In that case, this function behaves as if crypto.createPrivateKey() had been called, except that the type of the returned KeyObject will be 'public' and that the private key cannot be extracted from the returned KeyObject. Similarly, if a KeyObject with type 'private' is given, a new KeyObject with type 'public' will be returned and it will be impossible to extract the private key from the returned object.
trans-unit.target: 因为可以从私钥派生公钥，所以可以传递私钥而不是公钥。在那种情况下，此函数的行为就好像已调用 crypto.createPrivateKey() 一样，除了返回的 KeyObject 的类型将为 'public' 且无法从返回的 KeyObject 中提取私钥。同样，如果 KeyObject 了类型为 'private' KeyObject ，则将返回新的类型为 'public' KeyObject，并且将不可能从返回的对象中提取私钥。

trans-unit.source: Because public keys can be derived from private keys, a private key or a public key may be passed for key.

trans-unit.source: Because workers are all separate processes, they can be killed or re-spawned depending on a program's needs, without affecting other workers. As long as there are some workers still alive, the server will continue to accept connections. If no workers are alive, existing connections will be dropped and new connections will be refused. Node.js does not automatically manage the number of workers, however. It is the application's responsibility to manage the worker pool based on its own needs.
trans-unit.target: 因为worker都是独立的进程,所以可以根据程序的需要杀死或重新生成,而不会影响其他worker。只要有一些worker还活着,服务器就会继续接受连接。如果没有工人活着,现有的连接将被丢弃,新的连接将被拒绝。然而,Node.js不会自动管理工作者的数量。应用程序有责任根据自己的需求来管理工人池。

trans-unit.source: By default (allowHalfOpen is false) the socket will send a FIN packet back and destroy its file descriptor once it has written out its pending write queue. However, if allowHalfOpen is set to true, the socket will not automatically end() its writable side, allowing the user to write arbitrary amounts of data. The user must call end() explicitly to close the connection (i.e. sending a FIN packet back).
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下（ allowHalfOpen 为 false ），套接字将写出其挂起的写队列后，将发送回FIN数据包并销毁其文件描述符。但是，如果 allowHalfOpen 设置为 true ，套接字将不会自动 end() 其可写面，从而允许用户写入任意数量的数据。用户必须显式调用 end() 来关闭连接（即发送回FIN数据包）。

trans-unit.source: By default EventEmitters will print a warning if more than 10 listeners are added for a particular event. This is a useful default that helps finding memory leaks. Obviously, not all events should be limited to just 10 listeners. The emitter.setMaxListeners() method allows the limit to be modified for this specific EventEmitter instance. The value can be set to Infinity (or 0) to indicate an unlimited number of listeners.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，如果为特定事件添加了 10 个以上的侦听器，则 EventEmitter 会打印警告。这是一个有用的默认值，有助于查找内存泄漏。显然，并非所有事件都应仅限于10个侦听器。在 emitter.setMaxListeners() 方法允许极限进行修改此特定 EventEmitter 实例。该值可以设置为 Infinity （或 0 ）以指示无限数量的侦听器。

trans-unit.source: By default all unhandled rejections trigger a warning plus a deprecation warning for the very first unhandled rejection in case no unhandledRejection hook is used.

trans-unit.source: By default, child_process.fork() will spawn new Node.js instances using the process.execPath of the parent process. The execPath property in the options object allows for an alternative execution path to be used.

trans-unit.source: By default, Node.js will print process warnings to stderr. The --no-warnings command-line option can be used to suppress the default console output but the 'warning' event will still be emitted by the process object.

trans-unit.source: By default, a maximum of 10 listeners can be registered for any single event. This limit can be changed for individual EventEmitter instances using the emitter.setMaxListeners(n) method. To change the default for allEventEmitter instances, the EventEmitter.defaultMaxListeners property can be used. If this value is not a positive number, a TypeError will be thrown.

trans-unit.source: By default, binding a socket will cause it to block the Node.js process from exiting as long as the socket is open. The socket.unref() method can be used to exclude the socket from the reference counting that keeps the Node.js process active, allowing the process to exit even if the socket is still listening.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，只要套接字是打开的，绑定套接字将导致它阻止Node.js进程退出。所述 socket.unref() 方法可用于排除该保持Node.js的处理活动的，从而允许处理退出即使插座仍然侦听的引用计数套接字。

trans-unit.source: By default, binding a socket will cause it to block the Node.js process from exiting as long as the socket is open. The socket.unref() method can be used to exclude the socket from the reference counting that keeps the Node.js process active. The socket.ref() method adds the socket back to the reference counting and restores the default behavior.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，只要套接字是打开的，绑定套接字将导致它阻止Node.js进程退出。所述 socket.unref() 方法可用于排除该保持Node.js的处理活性的参考计数的插座。所述 socket.ref() 方法增加所述插座回参考计数并恢复默认行为。

trans-unit.source: By default, no encoding is assigned and stream data will be returned as Buffer objects. Setting an encoding causes the stream data to be returned as strings of the specified encoding rather than as Buffer objects. For instance, calling readable.setEncoding('utf8') will cause the output data to be interpreted as UTF-8 data, and passed as strings. Calling readable.setEncoding('hex') will cause the data to be encoded in hexadecimal string format.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，未分配任何编码，并且流数据将作为 Buffer 对象返回。设置编码会使流数据作为指定编码的字符串而不是作为 Buffer 对象返回。例如，调用 readable.setEncoding('utf8') 将导致输出数据被解释为UTF-8数据，并作为字符串传递。调用 readable.setEncoding('hex') 将导致数据以十六进制字符串格式编码。

trans-unit.source: By default, percent-encoded characters within the query string will be assumed to use UTF-8 encoding. If an alternative character encoding is used, then an alternative decodeURIComponent option will need to be specified:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，将假设查询字符串中的百分比编码字符使用UTF-8编码。如果使用其他字符编码，则需要指定其他的解码 decodeURIComponent 选项：

trans-unit.source: By default, pipes for stdin, stdout, and stderr are established between the parent Node.js process and the spawned child. These pipes have limited (and platform-specific) capacity. If the child process writes to stdout in excess of that limit without the output being captured, the child process will block waiting for the pipe buffer to accept more data. This is identical to the behavior of pipes in the shell. Use the { stdio: 'ignore' } option if the output will not be consumed.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，将在父Node.js进程与生成的子进程之间建立 stdin ， stdout 和 stderr 的管道。这些管道的容量有限（且特定于平台）。如果子进程超过该限制写入stdout而没有捕获输出，则子进程将阻塞等待管道缓冲区接受更多数据。这与外壳中管道的行为相同。如果将不使用输出，请使用 { stdio: 'ignore' } 选项。

trans-unit.source: By default, promise executions are not assigned asyncIds due to the relatively expensive nature of the promise introspection API provided by V8. This means that programs using promises or async/await will not get correct execution and trigger ids for promise callback contexts by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，由于V8提供的 asyncId 内省API的价格相对昂贵，因此没有为Promise执行分配asyncId。这意味着默认情况下，使用promise或 async / await 的程序将无法正确执行，并且不会为promise回调上下文触发ID。

trans-unit.source: By default, the querystring.unescape() method will attempt to use the JavaScript built-in decodeURIComponent() method to decode. If that fails, a safer equivalent that does not throw on malformed URLs will be used.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， querystring.unescape() 方法将尝试使用JavaScript内置的 decodeURIComponent() 方法进行解码。如果失败，将使用不会抛出格式错误的URL的更安全等效项。

trans-unit.source: By default, the Node.js REPL will persist history between node REPL sessions by saving inputs to a .node_repl_history file located in the user's home directory. This can be disabled by setting the environment variable NODE_REPL_HISTORY=''.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Node.js REPL 通过将输入保存到用户主目录中的 .node_repl_history 文件中，从而在 node REPL会话之间保留历史记录。可以通过设置环境变量 NODE_REPL_HISTORY='' 来禁用它。

trans-unit.source: By default, the Server's timeout value is 2 minutes, and sockets are destroyed automatically if they time out. However, if a callback is assigned to the Server's 'timeout' event, timeouts must be handled explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，服务器的超时值为2分钟，如果套接字超时，套接字将自动销毁。但是，如果将回调分配给服务器的 'timeout' 事件，则必须显式处理超时。

trans-unit.source: By default, the parent will wait for the detached child to exit. To prevent the parent from waiting for a given subprocess to exit, use the subprocess.unref() method. Doing so will cause the parent's event loop to not include the child in its reference count, allowing the parent to exit independently of the child, unless there is an established IPC channel between the child and the parent.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，父级将等待分离的子级退出。为了防止父级等待给定的 subprocess 退出，请使用 subprocess.unref() 方法。这样做将导致父级的事件循环在其引用计数中不包括子级，从而允许父级独立于子级退出，除非在子级与父级之间建立了IPC通道。

trans-unit.source: By default, this function is the same as net.createConnection(). However, custom agents may override this method in case greater flexibility is desired.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此函数与 net.createConnection() 相同。但是，如果需要更大的灵活性，定制代理可以覆盖此方法。

trans-unit.source: By default, when Node.js loads a module from a path that is symbolically linked to a different on-disk location, Node.js will dereference the link and use the actual on-disk "real path" of the module as both an identifier and as a root path to locate other dependency modules. In most cases, this default behavior is acceptable. However, when using symbolically linked peer dependencies, as illustrated in the example below, the default behavior causes an exception to be thrown if moduleA attempts to require moduleB as a peer dependency:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，当Node.js从符号链接到其他磁盘位置的路径加载模块时，Node.js将取消引用链接，并使用模块的实际磁盘“真实路径”作为标识符作为查找其他依赖项模块的根路径。在大多数情况下，此默认行为是可以接受的。但是，当使用符号链接的对等项依赖关系时，如下面的示例所示，如果 moduleA 尝试要求将 moduleB 作为对等项依赖关系，则默认行为将引发异常：

trans-unit.source: By default, when a timer is scheduled using either setTimeout() or setInterval(), the Node.js event loop will continue running as long as the timer is active. Each of the Timeout objects returned by these functions export both timeout.ref() and timeout.unref() functions that can be used to control this default behavior.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，使用 setTimeout() 或 setInterval() 安排计时器时，只要计时器处于活动状态，Node.js事件循环将继续运行。这些函数返回的每个 Timeout 对象均导出 timeout.ref() 和 timeout.unref() 函数，这些函数可用于控制此默认行为。

trans-unit.source: By default, when an immediate is scheduled, the Node.js event loop will continue running as long as the immediate is active. The Immediate object returned by setImmediate() exports both immediate.ref() and immediate.unref() functions that can be used to control this default behavior.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，安排即时实例后，只要即时实例处于活动状态，Node.js事件循环将继续运行。将 Immediate 通过返回的对象 setImmediate() 出口双双 immediate.ref() 和 immediate.unref() ，可用于控制此默认行为的功能。

trans-unit.source: By doing this, Node.js achieves a few things:
trans-unit.target: 通过这样做,Node.js实现了一些事情。

trans-unit.source: By starting a REPL from a Unix socket-based server instead of stdin, it is possible to connect to a long-running Node.js process without restarting it.
trans-unit.target: 通过从基于Unix套接字的服务器而不是stdin启动REPL,可以在不重启的情况下连接到一个长期运行的Node.js进程。

trans-unit.source: By the time main.js has loaded both modules, they're both finished. The output of this program would thus be:
trans-unit.target: 在 main.js 加载两个模块时，它们都已完成。因此，该程序的输出为：

trans-unit.source: By the very nature of how throw works in JavaScript, there is almost never any way to safely "pick up where it left off", without leaking references, or creating some other sort of undefined brittle state.
trans-unit.target: 本质上， throw 在JavaScript中是如何工作的，几乎没有任何方法可以安全地“清除掉它的地方”，而不会泄漏引用或创建其他未定义的脆性状态。

trans-unit.source: By using the context of a domain, and the resilience of separating our program into multiple worker processes, we can react more appropriately, and handle errors with much greater safety.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用域的上下文,以及将我们的程序分离成多个工作者进程的弹性,我们可以做出更恰当的反应,并更安全地处理错误。

trans-unit.target: 调用所有 destroy 钩子。只能调用一次。如果多次调用，则会引发错误。这必须手动调用。如果资源留给GC收集，则将永远不会调用 destroy 钩子。

This will establish the context, trigger the AsyncHooks before callbacks, call the function, trigger the AsyncHooks after callbacks, and then restore the original execution context.

trans-unit.source: Called when a class is constructed that has the possibility to emit an asynchronous event. This does not mean the instance must call before/after before destroy is called, only that the possibility exists.
trans-unit.target: 在构造一个可能发出异步事件的类时调用。这并不意味着该实例必须调用 before / after 前 destroy 被调用，只有这种可能性存在。

trans-unit.source: Called when the resolve function passed to the Promise constructor is invoked (either directly or through other means of resolving a promise).
trans-unit.target: 在调用传递给 Promise 构造函数的 resolve 函数时调用（直接或通过其他解决Promise的方法）。

trans-unit.source: Calling Buffer.alloc() can be significantly slower than the alternative Buffer.allocUnsafe() but ensures that the newly created Buffer instance contents will never contain sensitive data.
trans-unit.target: 调用 Buffer.alloc() 可能比替代方法 Buffer.allocUnsafe() 慢得多，但可以确保新创建的 Buffer 实例内容永远不会包含敏感数据。

trans-unit.source: Calling stream.read([size]) after the 'end' event has been emitted will return null. No runtime error will be raised.
trans-unit.target: 发出 'end' 事件后调用 stream.read([size]) 将返回 null 。没有运行时错误。

trans-unit.source: Calling .flush() on a compression stream will make zlib return as much output as currently possible. This may come at the cost of degraded compression quality, but can be useful when data needs to be available as soon as possible.
trans-unit.target: 在压缩流上调用 .flush() 将使 zlib 返回当前尽可能多的输出。这可能以降低压缩质量为代价，但是在需要尽快获得数据时很有用。

trans-unit.source: Calling assert.fail() with more than one argument is deprecated and emits a warning.
trans-unit.target: 不 assert.fail() 使用多个参数调用assert.fail（）并发出警告。

trans-unit.source: Calling callback(err) will result in a socket.destroy(err) call.
trans-unit.target: 调用 callback(err) 将导致 socket.destroy(err) 调用。

trans-unit.source: Calling console.assert() with a falsy assertion will only cause the message to be printed to the console without interrupting execution of subsequent code.
trans-unit.target: 以虚假的断言调用 console.assert() 只会导致将 message 打印到控制台，而不会中断后续代码的执行。

trans-unit.source: Calling enter() changes only the active domain, and does not alter the domain itself. enter() and exit() can be called an arbitrary number of times on a single domain.
trans-unit.target: 调用 enter() 只会更改活动域，而不会更改域本身。可以在单个域上多次调用 enter() 和 exit() 。

trans-unit.source: Calling exit() changes only the active domain, and does not alter the domain itself. enter() and exit() can be called an arbitrary number of times on a single domain.
trans-unit.target: 调用 exit() 只会更改活动域，而不会更改域本身。可以在单个域上多次调用 enter() 和 exit() 。

trans-unit.source: Calling fs.unwatchFile() with a filename that is not being watched is a no-op, not an error.
trans-unit.target: 使用未被监视的文件名调用 fs.unwatchFile() 是无操作的，不是错误。

trans-unit.source: Calling http2stream.pushStream() from within a pushed stream is not permitted and will throw an error.
trans-unit.target: http2stream.pushStream() 从推送的流中调用http2stream.pushStream（），这将引发错误。

trans-unit.source: Calling napi_wrap() a second time on an object will return an error. To associate another native instance with the object, use napi_remove_wrap() first.
trans-unit.target: 第二次在对象上调用 napi_wrap() 将返回错误。要将另一个本机实例与该对象相关联，请首先使用 napi_remove_wrap() 。

trans-unit.source: Calling process.exit() will force the process to exit as quickly as possible even if there are still asynchronous operations pending that have not yet completed fully, including I/O operations to process.stdout and process.stderr.
trans-unit.target: 调用 process.exit() 将强制进程尽快退出，即使仍有异步操作尚未完全完成，包括对 process.stdout 和 process.stderr 的 I / O操作 。

trans-unit.source: Calling readable.pause(), readable.unpipe(), or receiving backpressure will cause the readable.readableFlowing to be set as false, temporarily halting the flowing of events but not halting the generation of data. While in this state, attaching a listener for the 'data' event will not switch readable.readableFlowing to true.
trans-unit.target: 调用 readable.pause() ， readable.unpipe() ，或接收背压将使 readable.readableFlowing 要被设置为 false ，暂时停止事件的流动，但不停止数据的生成。在此状态下，为 'data' 事件附加侦听器不会将 readable.readableFlowing 切换为 true 。

trans-unit.source: Calling realpath now works again for various edge cases on Windows.
trans-unit.target: 现在，在Windows上的各种边缘情况下，调用 realpath 可以再次使用。

trans-unit.source: Calling realpathSync now works again for various edge cases on Windows.
trans-unit.target: 现在，再次调用 realpathSync 可以在Windows上的各种情况下工作。

trans-unit.source: Calling rl.close() does not immediately stop other events (including 'line') from being emitted by the readline.Interface instance.
trans-unit.target: 调用 rl.close() 不会立即阻止 readline.Interface 实例发出其他事件（包括 'line' ）。

trans-unit.source: Calling rl.pause() does not immediately pause other events (including 'line') from being emitted by the readline.Interface instance.
trans-unit.target: 调用 rl.pause() 不会立即暂停 readline.Interface 实例发出的其他事件（包括 'line' ）。

trans-unit.source: Calling socket.ref() multiples times will have no additional effect.
trans-unit.target: 多次调用 socket.ref() 不会产生任何其他影响。

trans-unit.source: Calling socket.unref() multiple times will have no addition effect.
trans-unit.target: 多次调用 socket.unref() 将没有任何附加作用。

trans-unit.source: Calling subprocess.ref() after making a call to subprocess.unref() will restore the removed reference count for the child process, forcing the parent to wait for the child to exit before exiting itself.
trans-unit.target: 在调用 subprocess.ref() 之后调用 subprocess.unref() 将为子进程恢复已删除的引用计数，从而迫使父进程在退出子进程之前等待子进程退出。

trans-unit.source: Calling timeout.unref() creates an internal timer that will wake the Node.js event loop. Creating too many of these can adversely impact performance of the Node.js application.
trans-unit.target: 调用 timeout.unref() 创建一个内部计时器，该计时器将唤醒Node.js事件循环。创建太多这些可能会对Node.js应用程序的性能产生不利影响。

trans-unit.source: Calling unref() on a port will allow the thread to exit if this is the only active handle in the event system. If the port is already unref()ed calling unref() again will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果这是事件系统中唯一的活动句柄，则在端口上调用 unref() 将允许线程退出。如果该端口已经被 unref() 编辑，则再次调用 unref() 将无效。

trans-unit.source: Calling unref() on a server will allow the program to exit if this is the only active server in the event system. If the server is already unrefed calling unref() again will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果这是事件系统中唯一的活动服务器，则在服务器上调用 unref() 将允许该程序退出。如果服务器已经 unref 引用， unref() 再次调用unref（）将无效。

trans-unit.source: Calling unref() on a socket will allow the program to exit if this is the only active socket in the event system. If the socket is already unrefed calling unref() again will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果这是事件系统中唯一的活动套接字，则在套接字上调用 unref() 将允许程序退出。如果套接字已被 unref 引用， unref() 再次调用unref（）将无效。

trans-unit.source: Calling unref() on a worker will allow the thread to exit if this is the only active handle in the event system. If the worker is already unref()ed calling unref() again will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果这是事件系统中唯一的活动句柄，则在工作线程上调用 unref() 将允许线程退出。如果工作 unref() 已经被unref（）编辑，则再次调用 unref() 将无效。

trans-unit.source: Calling an asynchronous function without a callback throws a TypeError in Node.js 10.0.0 onwards. See https://github.com/nodejs/node/pull/12562.
trans-unit.target: 调用没有回调的异步函数会在Node.js 10.0.0及更高版本中引发 TypeError 。参见https://github.com/nodejs/node/pull/12562。

trans-unit.source: Calling the writable.end() method signals that no more data will be written to the Writable. The optional chunk and encoding arguments allow one final additional chunk of data to be written immediately before closing the stream. If provided, the optional callback function is attached as a listener for the 'finish' event.
trans-unit.target: 调用 writable.end() 方法表示没有更多数据将被写入 Writable 。可选的 chunk 和 encoding 参数允许在关闭流之前立即写入最后一个额外的数据块。如果提供，则可选的 callback 函数将作为 'finish' 事件的侦听器附加。

trans-unit.target: 现在不建议在不传递 digest 参数的情况下调用此函数，并且将发出警告。

trans-unit.source: Calling this only flushes data from the internal zlib state, and does not perform flushing of any kind on the streams level. Rather, it behaves like a normal call to .write(), i.e. it will be queued up behind other pending writes and will only produce output when data is being read from the stream.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法只会从内部 zlib 状态刷新数据，并且不会在流级别执行任何类型的刷新。相反，它的行为类似于 .write() 的常规调用，即它将在其他挂起的写入之后排队，并且仅在从流中读取数据时才产生输出。

trans-unit.source: Care must be taken when using Transform streams in that data written to the stream can cause the Writable side of the stream to become paused if the output on the Readable side is not consumed.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Transform 流时，必须小心，因为如果不消耗 Readable 端的输出，则写入该流的数据可能会导致该流的 Writable 端变得暂停。

trans-unit.source: Careful planning is required to allow cyclic module dependencies to work correctly within an application.
trans-unit.target: 为了让循环模块的依赖性在应用程序中正常工作,需要仔细规划。

trans-unit.source: Causes .exitedAfterDisconnect to be set.

trans-unit.target: 导致在验证签名时自动确定 RSA_PKCS1_PSS_PADDING 的盐长度。

trans-unit.source: Close the underlying socket and stop listening for data on it. If a callback is provided, it is added as a listener for the 'close' event.
trans-unit.target: 关闭基础套接字，并停止侦听其上的数据。如果提供了回调，则会将其添加为 'close' 事件的侦听器。

trans-unit.source: Closes the Http2Stream instance by sending an RST_STREAM frame to the connected HTTP/2 peer.
trans-unit.target: 通过将 RST_STREAM 帧发送到连接的HTTP / 2对等方来关闭 Http2Stream 实例。

trans-unit.source: Closes the IPC channel between parent and child, allowing the child to exit gracefully once there are no other connections keeping it alive. After calling this method the subprocess.connected and process.connected properties in both the parent and child (respectively) will be set to false, and it will be no longer possible to pass messages between the processes.
trans-unit.target: 关闭父级和子级之间的IPC通道，一旦没有其他连接保持其活动状态，则允许子级正常退出。调用此方法后，父级和子级中的 subprocess.connected 和 process.connected 属性将分别设置为 false ，并且将不再可能在进程之间传递消息。

trans-unit.source: Computes the shared secret using otherPublicKey as the other party's public key and returns the computed shared secret. The supplied key is interpreted using specified inputEncoding, and the returned secret is encoded using the specified outputEncoding. If the inputEncoding is not provided, otherPublicKey is expected to be a Buffer, TypedArray, or DataView.
trans-unit.target: 使用 otherPublicKey 作为另一方的公钥计算共享密钥，并返回计算出的共享密钥。所提供的密钥是使用指定的解释 inputEncoding ，且返回的秘密使用指定的编码 outputEncoding 。如果 inputEncoding 没有提供， otherPublicKey 有望成为一个 Buffer ， TypedArray ，或 DataView 。

trans-unit.source: Computes the shared secret using otherPublicKey as the other party's public key and returns the computed shared secret. The supplied key is interpreted using the specified inputEncoding, and secret is encoded using specified outputEncoding. If the inputEncoding is not provided, otherPublicKey is expected to be a Buffer, TypedArray, or DataView.
trans-unit.target: 使用 otherPublicKey 作为另一方的公钥计算共享密钥，并返回计算出的共享密钥。使用指定的 inputEncoding 解释提供的密钥，并使用指定的 outputEncoding 编码secret。如果 inputEncoding 没有提供， otherPublicKey 有望成为一个 Buffer ， TypedArray ，或 DataView 。

trans-unit.source: Converts the EC Diffie-Hellman public key specified by key and curve to the format specified by format. The format argument specifies point encoding and can be 'compressed', 'uncompressed' or 'hybrid'. The supplied key is interpreted using the specified inputEncoding, and the returned key is encoded using the specified outputEncoding.

trans-unit.source: Core modules are always preferentially loaded if their identifier is passed to require(). For instance, require('http') will always return the built in HTTP module, even if there is a file by that name.
trans-unit.target: 如果核心模块的标识符传递给 require() ,则始终优先加载它们。例如， require('http') 将始终返回内置的HTTP模块，即使存在该名称的文件也是如此。

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the GetModuleNamespace abstract operation in the ECMAScript specification.
trans-unit.target: 对应于ECMAScript规范中的GetModuleNamespace抽象操作。

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the Instantiate() concrete method field of Source Text Module Records in the ECMAScript specification.
trans-unit.target: 对应于ECMAScript规范中“ 源文本模块记录”的Instantiate（）具体方法字段。

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the Evaluate() concrete method field of Source Text Module Records in the ECMAScript specification.
trans-unit.target: 对应于ECMAScript规范中“ 源文本模块记录”的Evaluate（）具体方法字段。

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the SSL_get_finished routine in OpenSSL and may be used to implement the tls-unique channel binding from RFC 5929.
trans-unit.target: 对应于OpenSSL中的 SSL_get_finished 例程，可用于实现RFC 5929中的tls- tls-unique 通道绑定。

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the SSL_get_peer_finished routine in OpenSSL and may be used to implement the tls-unique channel binding from RFC 5929.
trans-unit.target: 对应于OpenSSL中的 SSL_get_peer_finished 例程，可用于实现RFC 5929中的tls- tls-unique 通道绑定。

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the [[EvaluationError]] field of Source Text Module Records in the ECMAScript specification.
trans-unit.target: 对应于ECMAScript规范中“ 源文本模块记录”的 [[EvaluationError]] 字段。

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the [[RequestedModules]] field of Source Text Module Records in the ECMAScript specification.
trans-unit.target: 对应于ECMAScript规范中“ 源文本模块记录”的 [[RequestedModules]] 字段。

trans-unit.source: Create a new instance of the inspector.Session class. The inspector session needs to be connected through session.connect() before the messages can be dispatched to the inspector backend.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 inspector.Session 类的新实例。在将消息分派到检查器后端之前，需要通过 session.connect() 连接检查器会话。

trans-unit.source: Create an AsyncIterator object that iterates through each line in the input stream as a string. This method allows asynchronous iteration of readline.Interface objects through for await...of loops.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 AsyncIterator 对象，该对象以字符串形式遍历输入流中的每一行。此方法允许 readline.Interface 对象的异步迭代， for await...of 循环。

trans-unit.source: Creates a .stack property on targetObject, which when accessed returns a string representing the location in the code at which Error.captureStackTrace() was called.
trans-unit.target: 在 targetObject 上创建一个 .stack 属性，该属性在访问时返回一个字符串，该字符串表示代码中调用 Error.captureStackTrace() 的位置。

trans-unit.source: Creates a DiffieHellman key exchange object and generates a prime of primeLength bits using an optional specific numeric generator. If generator is not specified, the value 2 is used.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 DiffieHellman 密钥交换对象，并使用可选的特定数字 generator primeLength 位的素数。如果未指定 generator ，则使用值 2 。

trans-unit.source: Creates a DiffieHellman key exchange object using the supplied prime and an optional specific generator.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的 prime 和可选的特定 generator 创建 DiffieHellman 密钥交换对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates a Histogram object that samples and reports the event loop delay over time. The delays will be reported in nanoseconds.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 Histogram 对象，该对象采样并报告事件循环随时间的延迟。延迟将以纳秒为单位报告。

trans-unit.source: Creates a Promise that is resolved when the EventEmitter emits the given event or that is rejected when the EventEmitter emits 'error'. The Promise will resolve with an array of all the arguments emitted to the given event.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 Promise ，当 EventEmitter 发出给定事件时解决该承诺，或者当 EventEmitter 发出 'error' 时拒绝该承诺。该 Promise 将与所有发出给定的事件参数数组解决。

trans-unit.source: Creates a dgram.Socket object of the specified type. The type argument can be either 'udp4' or 'udp6'. An optional callback function can be passed which is added as a listener for 'message' events.
trans-unit.target: 创建指定 type 的 dgram.Socket 对象。所述 type 参数可以是 'udp4' 或 'udp6' 。可以传递一个可选的 callback 函数，该函数被添加为 'message' 事件的侦听器。

trans-unit.source: Creates a dgram.Socket object. Once the socket is created, calling socket.bind() will instruct the socket to begin listening for datagram messages. When address and port are not passed to socket.bind() the method will bind the socket to the "all interfaces" address on a random port (it does the right thing for both udp4 and udp6 sockets). The bound address and port can be retrieved using socket.address().address and socket.address().port.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 dgram.Socket 对象。创建套接字后，调用 socket.bind() 将指示套接字开始侦听数据报消息。当 address 和 port 未传递到 socket.bind() 时,该方法会将套接字绑定到随机端口上的“所有接口”地址（对于 udp4 和 udp6 套接字都做正确的事情）。可以使用 socket.address().address 和 socket.address().port 检索绑定的地址和端口。

trans-unit.source: Creates a code cache that can be used with the Script constructor's cachedData option. Returns a Buffer. This method may be called at any time and any number of times.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个可与脚本构造函数的 cachedData 选项一起使用的代码缓存。返回一个缓冲区。可以在任何时间和任何次数调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new tls.Server. The secureConnectionListener, if provided, is automatically set as a listener for the 'secureConnection' event.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的 tls.Server 。的 secureConnectionListener ，如果提供的话，将自动设置为用于一个听众 'secureConnection' 事件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new Buffer containing string. The encoding parameter identifies the character encoding of string.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个包含 string 的新 Buffer 。的 encoding 参数标识的编码字符 string 。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new Console with one or two writable stream instances. stdout is a writable stream to print log or info output. stderr is used for warning or error output. If stderr is not provided, stdout is used for stderr.
trans-unit.target: 用一个或两个可写流实例创建一个新的 Console 。 stdout 是可写流，用于打印日志或信息输出。 stderr 用于警告或错误输出。如果未提供 stderr ，则将 stdout 用于 stderr 。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new Deserializer object.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的 Deserializer 对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new Error object and sets the error.message property to the provided text message. If an object is passed as message, the text message is generated by calling message.toString(). The error.stack property will represent the point in the code at which new Error() was called. Stack traces are dependent on V8's stack trace API. Stack traces extend only to either (a) the beginning of synchronous code execution, or (b) the number of frames given by the property Error.stackTraceLimit, whichever is smaller.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的 Error 对象，并将 error.message 属性设置为提供的文本消息。如果将对象作为 message ，则通过调用 message.toString() 生成文本消息。该 error.stack 属性将代表在其中的代码点 new Error() 被调用。堆栈跟踪取决于V8的堆栈跟踪API。堆栈跟踪仅扩展到（a）同步代码执行的开始，或（b）由属性 Error.stackTraceLimit 给出的帧数，以较小者为准。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new PerformanceMark entry in the Performance Timeline. A PerformanceMark is a subclass of PerformanceEntry whose performanceEntry.entryType is always 'mark', and whose performanceEntry.duration is always 0. Performance marks are used to mark specific significant moments in the Performance Timeline.
trans-unit.target: 在性能时间轴中创建一个新的 PerformanceMark 条目。一个 PerformanceMark 是的一个子类 PerformanceEntry 其 performanceEntry.entryType 始终是 'mark' ，并且其 performanceEntry.duration 始终是 0 。绩效标记用于在绩效时间表中标记特定的重要时刻。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new PerformanceMeasure entry in the Performance Timeline. A PerformanceMeasure is a subclass of PerformanceEntry whose performanceEntry.entryType is always 'measure', and whose performanceEntry.duration measures the number of milliseconds elapsed since startMark and endMark.
trans-unit.target: 在效果时间表中创建一个新的 PerformanceMeasure 条目。一个 PerformanceMeasure 是的一个子类 PerformanceEntry 其 performanceEntry.entryType 总是 'measure' ，而其 performanceEntry.duration 措施以来的毫秒数过去 startMark 和 endMark 。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new Serializer object.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的 Serializer 对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new StringDecoder instance.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的 StringDecoder 实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new URL object by parsing the input relative to the base. If base is passed as a string, it will be parsed equivalent to new URL(base).
trans-unit.target: 通过相对于 base 解析 input 来创建新的 URL 对象。如果 base 作为字符串传递，它将被解析为与 new URL(base) 等效。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new ES Module object.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的ES Module 对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new TCP or IPC server.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的TCP或IPC服务器。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new secure pair object with two streams, one of which reads and writes the encrypted data and the other of which reads and writes the cleartext data. Generally, the encrypted stream is piped to/from an incoming encrypted data stream and the cleartext one is used as a replacement for the initial encrypted stream.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个具有两个流的新安全对对象,其中一个流读和写加密数据,另一个流读和写明文数据。一般来说,加密数据流是通过管道传输到/从传入的加密数据流中,而明文数据流则用来替代初始加密数据流。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new socket object.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的套接字对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates a predefined DiffieHellman key exchange object. The supported groups are: 'modp1', 'modp2', 'modp5' (defined in RFC 2412, but see Caveats) and 'modp14', 'modp15', 'modp16', 'modp17', 'modp18' (defined in RFC 3526). The returned object mimics the interface of objects created by crypto.createDiffieHellman(), but will not allow changing the keys (with diffieHellman.setPublicKey(), for example). The advantage of using this method is that the parties do not have to generate nor exchange a group modulus beforehand, saving both processor and communication time.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个预定义的 DiffieHellman 密钥交换对象。支持的组为： 'modp1' ， 'modp2' ， 'modp5' （在RFC 2412中定义，但请参见警告）和 'modp14' ， 'modp15' ， 'modp16' ， 'modp17' ， 'modp18' （在RFC中定义）3526）。返回的对象模仿由 crypto.createDiffieHellman() 创建的对象的接口，但不允许更改密钥（使用 diffieHellman.setPublicKey() ， 例如）。使用此方法的优点是各方不必事先生成或交换组模量，从而节省了处理器和通信时间。

trans-unit.source: Creates a symbolic link then resolves the Promise with no arguments upon success.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个符号链接，然后在成功时不带任何参数地解决 Promise 。

trans-unit.source: Creates a unique temporary directory and resolves the Promise with the created folder path. A unique directory name is generated by appending six random characters to the end of the provided prefix. Due to platform inconsistencies, avoid trailing X characters in prefix. Some platforms, notably the BSDs, can return more than six random characters, and replace trailing X characters in prefix with random characters.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个唯一的临时目录，并使用创建的文件夹路径解析 Promise 。通过在提供的 prefix 末尾附加六个随机字符来生成唯一的目录名称。由于平台不一致，请避免在 prefix 中尾随 X 个字符。某些平台，尤其是BSD，可以返回六个以上的随机字符，并将 prefix 尾随 X 字符替换为随机字符。

trans-unit.source: Creates a unique temporary directory.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个独特的临时目录。

trans-unit.source: Creates an Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) key exchange object using a predefined curve specified by the curveName string. Use crypto.getCurves() to obtain a list of available curve names. On recent OpenSSL releases, openssl ecparam -list_curves will also display the name and description of each available elliptic curve.
trans-unit.target: 使用 curveName 字符串指定的预定义曲线创建椭圆曲线Diffie-Hellman（ ECDH ）密钥交换对象。使用 crypto.getCurves() 获得可用曲线名称的列表。在最新的OpenSSL版本中， openssl ecparam -list_curves 还将显示每个可用椭圆曲线的名称和描述。

trans-unit.source: Creates an new TextDecoder instance. The encoding may specify one of the supported encodings or an alias.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的 TextDecoder 实例。所述 encoding 可指定支持的编码或别名之一。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a Cipher object that uses the given algorithm and password.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回使用给定 algorithm 和 password 的 Cipher 对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a Cipher object, with the given algorithm, key and initialization vector (iv).
trans-unit.target: 使用给定的 algorithm ， key 和初始化向量（ iv ）创建并返回一个 Cipher 对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a Decipher object that uses the given algorithm and password (key).
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回使用给定 algorithm 和 password （密钥）的 Decipher 对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a Decipher object that uses the given algorithm, key and initialization vector (iv).
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回使用给定 algorithm ， key 和初始化向量（ iv ）的 Decipher 对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a Hash object that can be used to generate hash digests using the given algorithm. Optional options argument controls stream behavior. For XOF hash functions such as 'shake256', the outputLength option can be used to specify the desired output length in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个 Hash 对象，该对象可用于使用给定 algorithm 生成哈希摘要。可选 options 参数控制流的行为。对于XOF散列函数（例如 'shake256' )， outputLength 选项可用于指定所需的输出长度（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a Sign object that uses the given algorithm. Use crypto.getHashes() to obtain the names of the available digest algorithms. Optional options argument controls the stream.Writable behavior.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回使用给定 algorithm 的 Sign 对象。使用 crypto.getHashes() 获取可用摘要算法的名称。可选的 options 参数控制 stream.Writable 行为。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a Tracing object for the given set of categories.
trans-unit.target: 为给定的 categories 集创建并返回一个 Tracing 对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a Verify object that uses the given algorithm. Use crypto.getHashes() to obtain an array of names of the available signing algorithms. Optional options argument controls the stream.Writable behavior.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回使用给定算法的 Verify 对象。使用 crypto.getHashes() 获得可用签名算法名称的数组。可选的 options 参数控制 stream.Writable 行为。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new BrotliCompress object.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个新的 BrotliCompress 对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new BrotliDecompress object.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个新的 BrotliDecompress 对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new Deflate object.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个新的 Deflate 对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new DeflateRaw object.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个新的 DeflateRaw 对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new Gunzip object.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个新的 Gunzip 对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new Gzip object. See example.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个新的 Gzip 对象。参见示例。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new Inflate object.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个新的 Inflate 对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new InflateRaw object.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个新的 InflateRaw 对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new Unzip object.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个新的 Unzip 对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new key object containing a private key. If key is a string or Buffer, format is assumed to be 'pem'; otherwise, key must be an object with the properties described above.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个包含私钥的新密钥对象。如果 key 是字符串或 Buffer ，则假定 format 为 'pem' ；否则， key 必须是具有上述属性的对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new key object containing a public key. If key is a string or Buffer, format is assumed to be 'pem'; if key is a KeyObject with type 'private', the public key is derived from the given private key; otherwise, key must be an object with the properties described above.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个包含公共密钥的新密钥对象。如果 key 是字符串或 Buffer ，则假定 format 为 'pem' ；如果 key 是类型为 'private' 的 KeyObject ，则公钥是从给定的私钥派生的；否则， key 必须是具有上述属性的对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new key object containing a secret key for symmetric encryption or Hmac.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个新密钥对象，该对象包含用于对称加密或 Hmac 的秘密密钥。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an iterator for buf values (bytes). This function is called automatically when a Buffer is used in a for..of statement.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个迭代器用于 buf 值（字节）。在 for..of 语句中使用 Buffer 时，将自动调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an iterator of [index, byte] pairs from the contents of buf.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个迭代的 [index, byte] 从内容对 buf 。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an iterator of buf keys (indices).
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个迭代器的 buf 键（索引）。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an Hmac object that uses the given algorithm and key. Optional options argument controls stream behavior.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回使用给定 algorithm 和 key 的 Hmac 对象。可选 options 参数控制流的行为。

trans-unit.source: Creating Worker instances inside of other Workers is possible.
trans-unit.target: 可以在其他 Worker 内部创建 Worker 实例。

trans-unit.source: Creating a new vm.Script object compiles code but does not run it. The compiled vm.Script can be run later multiple times. The code is not bound to any global object; rather, it is bound before each run, just for that run.
trans-unit.target: 创建新的 vm.Script 对象会编译 code 但不会运行它。编译后的 vm.Script 可以在以后多次运行。该 code 未绑定到任何全局对象。而是在每次运行之前绑定，仅针对该运行。

trans-unit.source: Custom Transform implementations may implement the transform._flush() method. This will be called when there is no more written data to be consumed, but before the 'end' event is emitted signaling the end of the Readable stream.
trans-unit.target: 自定义 Transform 实现可以实现 transform._flush() 方法。当没有更多的写入数据要使用时，但是在发出 'end' 事件之前，该信号将调用 Readable 流的结尾，将调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Custom Duplex streams must call the new stream.Duplex([options]) constructor and implement both the readable._read() and writable._write() methods.
trans-unit.target: 自 Duplex 流必须调用 new stream.Duplex([options]) 构造函数和落实双方的 readable._read() 和 writable._write() 方法。

trans-unit.source: Custom Readable streams must call the new stream.Readable([options]) constructor and implement the readable._read() method.
trans-unit.target: 自定义 Readable 流必须调用 new stream.Readable([options]) 构造函数并实现 readable._read() 方法。

trans-unit.source: Custom Writable streams must call the new stream.Writable([options]) constructor and implement the writable._write() method. The writable._writev() method may also be implemented.
trans-unit.target: 自定义 Writable 流必须调用 new stream.Writable([options]) 构造函数并实现 writable._write() 方法。所述 writable._writev() 方法可以还实现。

trans-unit.target: 自定义 [util.inspect.custom](depth, opts) 函数通常返回字符串，但可能会返回 util.inspect() 进行相应格式化的任何类型的值。

trans-unit.source: DNS server operators may choose not to respond to ANY queries. It may be better to call individual methods like dns.resolve4(), dns.resolveMx(), and so on. For more details, see RFC 8482.
trans-unit.target: DNS服务器操作员可以选择不响应 ANY 查询。最好调用 dns.resolve4() ， dns.resolveMx() 等单个方法。有关更多详细信息，请参见RFC 8482。

trans-unit.source: Data could be sent on a socket.
trans-unit.target: 数据可以在套接字上发送。

trans-unit.source: Data is buffered in Readable streams when the implementation calls stream.push(chunk). If the consumer of the Stream does not call stream.read(), the data will sit in the internal queue until it is consumed.
trans-unit.target: 当实现调用 stream.push(chunk) 时，数据将缓存在 Readable 流中。如果Stream的使用者未调用 stream.read() ，则数据将位于内部队列中，直到被使用。

trans-unit.source: Data is buffered in Writable streams when the writable.write(chunk) method is called repeatedly. While the total size of the internal write buffer is below the threshold set by highWaterMark, calls to writable.write() will return true. Once the size of the internal buffer reaches or exceeds the highWaterMark, false will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 重复调用 writable.write(chunk) 方法时，数据将缓存在 Writable 流中。当内部写缓冲区的总大小低于 highWaterMark 设置的阈值时，对 writable.write() 的调用将返回 true 。一旦内部缓冲区的大小达到或超过 highWaterMark ，将返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: Despite the relative order of TLSv1.3 and TLSv1.2 cipher suites, the TLSv1.3 protocol is significantly more secure than TLSv1.2, and will always be chosen over TLSv1.2 if the handshake indicates it is supported, and if any TLSv1.3 cipher suites are enabled.
trans-unit.target: 尽管TLSv1.3和TLSv1.2密码套件有相对的顺序,但TLSv1.3协议的安全性明显高于TLSv1.2,如果握手表明支持TLSv1.3,并且启用了任何TLSv1.3密码套件,那么TLSv1.3协议将永远被选择,而不是TLSv1.2。

trans-unit.source: Destroy any sockets that are currently in use by the agent.
trans-unit.target: 销毁代理当前正在使用的任何套接字。

trans-unit.source: Destroy the stream, and optionally emit an 'error' event. After this call, the transform stream would release any internal resources. Implementors should not override this method, but instead implement readable._destroy(). The default implementation of _destroy() for Transform also emit 'close' unless emitClose is set in false.
trans-unit.target: 销毁流，并有选择地发出 'error' 事件。在此调用之后，转换流将释放任何内部资源。实现者不应重写此方法，而应实现 readable._destroy() 。 _destroy() 的 Transform 的默认实现也发出 'close' 除非将 emitClose 设置为false。

trans-unit.source: Destroy the stream. Optionally emit an 'error' event, and emit a 'close' event unless emitClose is set in false. After this call, the readable stream will release any internal resources and subsequent calls to push() will be ignored. Implementors should not override this method, but instead implement readable._destroy().
trans-unit.target: 销毁流。可选地，发出 'error' 事件，并发出 'close' 事件，除非在 false 中设置了 emitClose 。在此调用之后，可读流将释放所有内部资源，并且随后对 push() 的调用将被忽略。实现者不应重写此方法，而应实现 readable._destroy() 。

trans-unit.source: Destroy the stream. Optionally emit an 'error' event, and emit a 'close' event unless emitClose is set in false. After this call, the writable stream has ended and subsequent calls to write() or end() will result in an ERR_STREAM_DESTROYED error. This is a destructive and immediate way to destroy a stream. Previous calls to write() may not have drained, and may trigger an ERR_STREAM_DESTROYED error. Use end() instead of destroy if data should flush before close, or wait for the 'drain' event before destroying the stream. Implementors should not override this method, but instead implement writable._destroy().
trans-unit.target: 销毁流。可选地，发出 'error' 事件，并发出 'close' 事件，除非将 emitClose 设置为 false 。在此调用之后，可写流已结束，随后对 write() 或 end() 的调用将导致 ERR_STREAM_DESTROYED 错误。这是销毁流的破坏性且直接的方法。先前对 write() 的调用可能没有耗尽，并且可能触发 ERR_STREAM_DESTROYED 错误。如果数据应该在关闭之前刷新，或者使用 'drain' ，请使用 end() 而不是destroy 。销毁流之前发生的事件。实现者不应重写此方法，而应实现 writable._destroy() 。

trans-unit.source: Domain error handlers are not a substitute for closing down a process when an error occurs.

trans-unit.source: Domains and Promises
trans-unit.target: 领域和承诺

trans-unit.source: Domains provide a way to handle multiple different IO operations as a single group. If any of the event emitters or callbacks registered to a domain emit an 'error' event, or throw an error, then the domain object will be notified, rather than losing the context of the error in the process.on('uncaughtException') handler, or causing the program to exit immediately with an error code.
trans-unit.target: 域提供了一种将多个不同的IO操作作为一个组处理的方法。如果注册到域的任何事件发射器或回调都发出 'error' 事件或引发错误，则将通知域对象，而不是在流程中丢失错误的上下文 process.on('uncaughtException') 处理程序，或导致程序立即退出并显示错误代码。

trans-unit.source: Domains will not interfere with the error handling mechanisms for Promises. In other words, no 'error' event will be emitted for unhandled Promise rejections.
trans-unit.target: 域不会干扰Promises的错误处理机制。换句话说，未处理的 Promise 拒绝将不会发出 'error' 事件。

trans-unit.source: Don't call server.address() until the 'listening' event has been emitted.
trans-unit.target: 在发出 'listening' 事件之前，请勿调用 server.address() 。

trans-unit.source: Due to the confusing notation, it is recommended not to use a string as the second argument. This might lead to difficult-to-spot errors.
trans-unit.target: 由于符号混乱,建议不要使用字符串作为第二个参数。这可能会导致难以发现的错误。
